DOC.brief_summary: Investigators conduct randomize control trial overweight obese college student University Minnesota campus . The primary outcome weight loss measure 12 month study enrollment ( correspond 10 month end treatment ) .
DOC.brief_title: Lose 2 Win A Novel Method Motivate Weight Loss Maintenance Among College Students
DOC.detailed_description: Approximately 30 % college student overweight obese . Intervening excess weight early may eliminate obesity-related morbidity . Evidence support use monetary incentive encourage weight-loss ; question remain efficacy contingency management weight loss maintenance . `` Lose 2 Win '' contest participant achieve weight-loss goal eligible cash prize , appear well-suited implementation campus . Our objective two-phase trial evaluate feasibility , acceptability efficacy Lose 2 Win weight-loss maintenance among college student .
DOC.criteria: 1824 year age University Minnesota Freshman , Sophomore , Junior Plan enrol U Minnesota Spring 2013 BMI great equal 26 less equal 35.5 Have work internet phone access Ability read/write English Ability safely engage exercise Currently pregnant breastfeed Prior plan weight loss surgery Having special diet member `` organize weight loss program '' Diagnosis Diabetes Have Binge Eating Disorder Have lose great equal 10 pound last 3 month
